headline: Second year law student at University of La Verne College of Law
summary: I am a very ambitious and motivated individual who thrives under pressure.  I am extremely organized to ensure everything gets done correctly and in a timely manner.  I enjoy setting and achieving high goals and blossom in a fast paced environment.  My marketing experience has shown me the importance of making and maintaining relationships to help a business really flourish.  I love being able to know customers on a first name basis and really make them feel appreciated.  I enjoy mentoring and developing employees and watching them succeed.  I always have a positive attitude which is essential to ensure a happy and productive work environment.

positions.description:
As an assistant manager, I mentored, lead and motivated employees.  I also ensured the branch ran smoothly and created and executed plans for improvement in customer service, growth, employee development and profitability.  I improved the customer service score 9 points at the Port Angeles location within two months of arriving at that location. 

Management of Customer Service and Operations:
-Manage branch employees to ensure successful branch performance
-Develop and maintain a plan for positive growth, employee development, profitability and customer service
-Ensure employees are demonstrating professional phone techniques
-Ensure employees are being held accountable and executing tasks properly and successfully
-Actively work and delegate bad debts 
-Exercise cost control

Human Resources Management:
-Participation and recommendation of potential new hires
-Coach, train and develop both new and existing employees
-Motivate and engage employees
-Follow up on assignments and hold employees accountable
-Write employee reviews and provide necessary feedback
-Manage employee hours
-Create a schedule that is beneficial to the business and the work/life balance of the employee

Marketing Effectiveness:
-Plan and execute branch's marketing strategy
-Ensure every employee has a current project
-Create a weekly marketing schedule to ensure consistent marketplace exposure

Assisted one employee to get promoted to Assistant Manager
Assisted two employees to successfully pass the Management Qualification Interview
positions.location: Bremerton, WA | Poulsbo, WA | Port Angeles, WA
positions.title: Assistant Manager

positions.description:
-Finished #1in training class
-Won several sales competitions involving upgrades, protection product sales and reservations
-Marketed to various shops, dealerships and hotels
-Actively called customers to follow up and ensure excellent customer service
-Helped to train new hires and lead by example
positions.title: Management Trainee

-Make reservations for the RV Park and Villas on the naval base
-Oversee equipment rentals such as kayaks, canoes, bicycles, camping equipment and party rentals
-Help train and develop new hires
-Execute proper maintenance and usage of rock climbing wall and follow safety procedures
positions.title: Recreation Aid

-Helped to lower the loss prevention percentage and increase annual sales

-Maintained a clean and organized work environment
-Received and inventoried incoming shipments
-Followed guidelines to set out displays for new products
positions.title: Sales Associate

positions.title: Sales Associate and Cashier

-Worked as a team to meet and exceed sales goals
